Our bodies grow and change over time. As we get older, our bodies start to slow down. Our hearts beat a little slower, our muscles get a little weaker, and our brains remember things a little less. It's like our bodies are winding down, like a clock running low on batteries. Eventually, our bodies will stop working altogether, and we won't be able to move or breathe on our own. But for now, we get to enjoy life, play, and have fun while our bodies are still strong and healthy. We're lucky to have time to grow up and learn new things.
